name: Dim Lights Demo
description:
Dim Lights is a horror game, pretty cool huh? I made this game a few months ago, just because I was bored and had nothing to do. But surprise surprise, I'm now currently working on the fully finished release and planning to release it on Steam.

I would gladly appreaciate if you'd leave a small donation to help me develop the game even more. I'll probably make a kickstarter, who knows?

(WARNING: The game is still in development, there may be bugs/glitches)

Discord Community Link: https://discord.gg/xp5k8rDh9E
